sec.div: 2.2.6. Chitosan-Based Caron Quantum Dot Spectrofluorimetric Characterization
sec.p: Fluorescence measurements were performed using an Ocean Optics 2000 spectro-fluorimeter for non-diluted CQD solutions. Measurements were conducted using cuvettes with an optical length of 1 cm with the integration time of 10,000 ms. Fluorescence excitation was performed with an UV light-emitting diode with an emission maximum at 365 nm using distilled water as a blank probe.
